name: Apache License 2.0
description: Permissive open source license that allows commercial use, modification, distribution, and patent use

name: MIT License
description: Simple permissive license with conditions only requiring preservation of copyright and license notices

name: BSD 3-Clause License
description: Permissive license similar to the BSD 2-Clause License, but with a 3rd clause

name: GNU General Public License v3.0
description: Copyleft license that requires derivative works to be open source under the same license

name: GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1
description: Copyleft license for libraries that allows linking with proprietary software

name: Mozilla Public License 2.0
description: Weak copyleft license that requires modifications to be open source
